name: Beach Yoga Session
description: Start your day with a relaxing yoga session on Sant Pol beach with stunning sea views.

name: Guided Historical Tour
description: Explore the rich history of Sant Feliu with an expert local guide through the old town.

name: Kayaking Adventure
description: Paddle along the beautiful Costa Brava coastline and discover hidden coves.

name: Traditional Cooking Class
description: Learn to prepare authentic Catalan dishes with a local chef in a hands-on experience.

name: Wine Tasting Tour
description: Visit local wineries and sample the finest wines of the Empord√† region.

name: Snorkeling Experience
description: Discover the underwater world of the Mediterranean with all equipment provided.

name: Sunset Boat Trip
description: Enjoy a magical sunset cruise along the coast with drinks and tapas included.

name: Mountain Hiking
description: Trek through the stunning landscapes of Les Gavarres with panoramic views.

name: Art Workshop
description: Unleash your creativity in a painting workshop inspired by Costa Brava landscapes.

name: Tapas Walking Tour
description: Taste the best local tapas while exploring the charming streets of the town.

name: Photography Walk
description: Capture the beauty of Sant Feliu with a professional photographer as your guide.

name: Night Cultural Show
description: Experience traditional Catalan music and dance in an intimate evening performance.
